summary: In 1944 France, a group of escaped American military prisoners en route to Switzerland volunteers to steal a Nazi V2 rocket warhead for the Allies.
cast: Bo Svenson|Peter Hooten|Fred Williamson|Michael Pergolani|Jackie Basehart|Michel Constantin|Debra Berger|Raimund Harmstorf|Ian Bannen|Flavio Andreini|Peter Boom|Vito Fornari|Manfred Freyberger|Joshua Sinclair|Mike Morris|Donald O'Brien|Gerard Schwarz|Bryan Rostron|Massimo Vanni|Bill Vanders|Mauro Vestri|Enzo G. Castellari|Enrico Cesaretti|Massimo Ciprari|Franz Colangeli|Andrea Girolami|Ulla Johannsen|Rocco Lerro|Giuseppe Marrocco|Roberto Messina|Attilio Pelegatti|Pietro Plinio Quinzi|Angelo Ragusa|Roberto Sbarigia|Settimio Scacco|Clemente Ukmar|Franco Ukmar|Luciano Zanussi
title: Aquel maldito tren blindado
